definition: farmstead/village/manor/place of business/banker (in a gambling game)/grave or solemn/holdings of a landlord (in imperial China)
erhua variant of 莊稼戶|庄稼户[zhuang1 jia5 hu4]

sentences.english: Part of every crop is saved for seed.
sentences.chinese: 每一种庄稼都留一部分成作种子。

sentences.english: The summer storm laid the crops.
sentences.chinese: 夏日的风暴刮倒了庄稼。

sentences.english: They irrigated their crops with water from this river .
sentences.chinese: 他们用这条小河里的水浇庄稼。

sentences.english: If it should rain , the crops would be saved.
sentences.chinese: 如果下雨的话，庄稼就有救了。

sentences.english: The seasons used to be certain and we would know when to plant crops.
sentences.chinese: 以往的季节很确定，我们知道什么时候该种庄稼。

sentences.english: He could see where Shandy wasrunning by the path she was making through the crop, chasing imaginary rabbits."Shandy
sentences.chinese: 他看到姗蒂正穿越庄稼，追逐假想中的兔子。

sentences.english: When all the crops are safely gathered in, the farmers can rest.
sentences.chinese: 当所有的庄稼都安全入仓后，农民们便可以休息了。

sentences.english: There are villages where there are no one to bring in the crops.
sentences.chinese: 在一些村庄里，甚至连种庄稼的人都没有。

sentences.english: 268:The villagers were planting trees to protect the crops from the strong wind.
sentences.chinese: 为保护庄稼免受强风侵害，村民在植树。

sentences.english: When crops turn yellow in autumn, the peasants start to harvest them.
sentences.chinese: 当庄稼在秋天变黄时，农民就开始收获了。

sentences.english: The grain was rubbed out of the ears in the clump and scattered in the prepared soil.
sentences.chinese: 将这块地上耳穗里的庄稼搓出并撒到备好的土地里。

sentences.english: Famine eventuated from the crop failure.
sentences.chinese: 因庄稼歉收饥荒终于发生了。

sentences.english: At that time making it to a mess and confused farmer can not farm.
sentences.chinese: 那时节令很乱，弄得庄稼人无法种田。

sentences.english: The crops were not touched by the early frost.
sentences.chinese: 庄稼未受到初霜的损害。

sentences.english: Keep these animals out of the fields.
sentences.chinese: 别让这些动物进庄稼地里去。

sentences.english: Electricity is widely used in cutting and chaffing of crops.
sentences.chinese: 电力的广泛应用在切割和擦伤的庄稼。
